title: Implement Power BI embedding with hierarchical filtering
description: Integrate Power BI reports using user-owns-data model with Azure AD tokens. Implement hierarchical filtering based on organizational structure, basic interactive filters (date range, team selector), and responsive embedding within overlay UI design.

title: Add advanced analytics and predictive modeling
description: Production enhancement with predictive compliance modeling, what-if scenario analysis, and advanced statistical insights. Includes ML model development, historical trend prediction, and intervention recommendation engine powered by AI/ML platforms.

title: Implement Power BI report sync with chat interactions
description: Advanced feature to synchronize Power BI visualizations with AI chat conversations. When AI mentions specific data points (e.g., 'Friday compliance dropped'), automatically highlight corresponding elements in the Power BI report. Requires Power BI JavaScript API integration and conversation context parsing.

title: Create global benchmarks table for synthetic data
description: Design and implement the global benchmarks table with regional performance targets, industry standards, and peer comparisons. Include monthly benchmark data for North America (75%), EMEA (68%), APAC (72%), and global average calculations to support 'How does regional compliance compare to global benchmarks?' queries.

title: Add skill invocation best practices section to AGENTS.md
description: Add a new section covering skill invocation best practices: 1) When to invoke skills (before starting work vs reactive), 2) How to choose between related skills (e.g., git vs git-hygiene), 3) Skill precedence rules when multiple apply, 4) Examples of good skill usage patterns in different scenarios, 5) Common anti-patterns to avoid when using skills

title: Develop synthetic data generation script
description: Create Python/SQL script to generate realistic synthetic compliance data for POC. Include 150-200 employees across 3 regions, 6 months of badge events with realistic patterns (Friday dips, regional variance, monthly trends), organizational hierarchy with proper manager-employee relationships, and country-specific holidays. Data must support Power BI visualizations and Copilot Studio conversation flows.

title: Integrate with live RokFusion data pipeline
description: Production feature to replace synthetic data with real-time RokFusion integration. Includes data pipeline setup, real-time refresh capabilities, data quality monitoring, and migration from synthetic to production data sources. Critical for production deployment.

title: Set up Azure AD applications and security groups
description: Create and configure Azure AD app registrations for Next.js SPA and Copilot Studio authentication. Set up security group assignments, permissions (User.Read, Directory.Read.All), redirect URIs, and conditional access policies for POC demonstration.

title: Add skill discovery and maintenance section to AGENTS.md
description: Document how to manage the skill ecosystem: 1) How to identify when new skills are needed, 2) Process for creating custom skills for project-specific needs, 3) How to keep skills up-to-date and relevant, 4) Guidelines for skill naming and organization, 5) How to deprecate or refactor outdated skills

title: Configure Databricks Unity Catalog with row-level security
description: Set up Databricks workspace with Unity Catalog for synthetic data. Implement row-level security (RLS) functions to enforce organizational hierarchy. Configure Genie workspace for natural language querying with proper access controls.

title: HR Leadership Team AI Dashboard POC
description: Proof of Concept implementation of HR Leadership Team AI Dashboard with Power BI reporting and Copilot Studio AI assistant. Includes Next.js web app with Azure AD authentication, hierarchical access controls, synthetic data in Databricks, and side-by-side dashboard + chat experience for customer demonstration.

title: Develop Next.js application with Azure AD authentication
description: Build Next.js web application with MSAL authentication, protected routing, and security group validation. Include overlay UI design with full-screen Power BI and collapsible chat panel. Implement hierarchical access controls and session management.

title: Configure Copilot Studio agent with Databricks Genie integration
description: Set up Copilot Studio agent with authenticated Azure AD integration. Configure conversation flows for compliance analysis (trend analysis, pattern recognition, benchmark comparison, location analysis). Connect directly to Databricks Genie API with Unity Catalog security.

title: Add multi-page Power BI report navigation
description: Enhanced Power BI integration supporting navigation between multiple report pages (Compliance Overview, Team Details, Trends Analysis). Includes page-specific filtering, breadcrumb navigation, and coordinated chat context based on current report page.

title: AGENTS.md Documentation Improvements
description: Comprehensive improvement of AGENTS.md documentation to better support agent workflows and skill usage. This epic encompasses documenting missing skills, integration patterns, best practices, and ecosystem management for the agent skills system.

title: Add Skill + TodoWrite integration documentation to AGENTS.md
description: Add documentation section explaining how to integrate skills with TodoWrite tool for better task tracking. This will help agents consistently create todos from skill checklists and track progress systematically.

title: Complete skill documentation in AGENTS.md
description: Enhance AGENTS.md with missing skill details: 1) Add specific engineering skills (refactoring, tdd, performance-optimization) to the Engineering Skills table with descriptions and use cases, 2) Add specific research skills (technical-research, evaluation, proof-of-concept) to the Research Skills section with descriptions and use cases, 3) Ensure all 26 skills are properly documented with clear when-to-use guidance

title: Implement automated alerting and notifications
description: Production feature for automated compliance monitoring with configurable alerts. Include email/Teams notifications for threshold breaches, trend degradation, and anomaly detection. Requires integration with notification services and alert management workflows.
